S1.T1.caption: Table 1: An overview of related survey papers.
S1.T1.table:
Work Year Description
Steiner & Lupu [15] 2016 RA methods for wireless sensor networks.
Arias et al. [16] 2018 A brief review of device attestation methods.
Sfyrakis & Groß [17] 2020 Hardware methods for attesting network infrastructures.
Johnson et al. [18] 2021 A review of RA schemes for embedded systems.
Ankergård et al. [19] 2021 State-of-the-art software-based RA for IoT devices.
Kuang et al. [20] 2022 A general review of RA schemes for IoT devices.
Ambrosin et al. [21] 2022 Collective RA schemes for large IoT networks.
This Paper 2024 A comprehensive analysis of control-flow attestation.
references: To the best of our knowledge, no extensive survey currently exists summarizing CFA schemes; however, several existing papers survey remote attestation (RA) more generally in different contexts, which we summarise in Table 1.

references: Table 2 summarises the CFA proposals found in the state of the art in chronological order. We extracted the key features from each proposal based on the areas presented previously in Figure 3. More specifically, we consider the following criteria:
